code: import React from'react';import{useTodos}from'../../hooks/useTodos';import{CheckCircle,Circle,Target}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TodoStats=()=>{const{stats}=useTodos();const statItems=[{label:'Total Tasks',value:stats.total,icon:Target,color:'text-purple-400'},{label:'Completed',value:stats.completed,icon:CheckCircle,color:'text-green-400'},{label:'Active',value:stats.active,icon:Circle,color:'text-yellow-400'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4 mb-8",children:statItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"glass-card p-4 animate-fade-in",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(item.icon,{className:`h-6 w-6 ${item.color}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`text-2xl font-bold ${item.color}`,children:item.value}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-gray-400 text-sm",children:item.label})]})]})},item.label))});};export default TodoStats;
